You and [your_dragon.GetFullName] enter the battlefield. The enemy holds its breath as [your_dragon.GetFullName] floods the sky and the ground with fire. The enemy soldiers melt with their armor, or flee from the flying inferno. The day is yours!
The enemy has garrisoned himself within his holding. But castles are not dragon-proof! The flames of [your_dragon.GetFullName] devour the castle, killing scores of men, women, and children.
